author: mseidel42
body:
- Updated Rivet and YODA, should fix some broken analyses, see https://gitlab.cern.ch/cms-gen/Rivet/-/issues/73
- Removed `Source1` patch as it is included in Rivet 4.0.1
- Change YODA plotting `script_generator.py` to `python3`, see https://gitlab.com/hepcedar/rivet/-/issues/494
title: Rivet 4.0.1 and YODA 2.0.1
